doc:
Rodolfo Acosta https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rodolfo_Acosta 0 Rodolfo Pérez Acosta (July 29, 1920 – November 7, 1974) was a Mexican-American character actor who became known for his roles as Mexican outlaws or Native Americans in Hollywood western films. He was sometimes credited as Rudolph Acosta. Rodolfo_Pérez_Acosta ( July_29_,_1920 – November_7_,_1974 ) was a_Mexican-American_character_actor who became_known for his_roles as Mexican_outlaws or Native_Americans in Hollywood_western_films . He was_sometimes_credited as Rudolph_Acosta .
